sources.title: 1944 - Phantom Lady - La dama desconocida - Robert Siodmak - VOSE
Phantom Lady (1944) Directed By Robert Siodmak, Starring Franchot Tone, Ella Raines, Alan Curtis
sources.description: Phantom Lady is a 1944 American FILM NOlR directed by Robert Siodmak and starring Franchot Tone, Ella Raines, and Alan Curtis. IThe film was Siodmak's first Hollywood noir and was based on the novel of the same name written by Cornell Woolrich but published under the pseudonym William Irish. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and read an article from FILM NOlR of the Week . A detailed article from online blog Film Noir Board may still be available.

metadata.Plot: Unhappily married Scott Henderson spends the evening on a no-name basis with a hat-wearing woman he picked up in a bar. Returning home, he finds his wife strangled and becomes the prime suspect in her murder. Every effort to establish his alibi fails; oddly no one seems to remember seeing the phantom lady (or her hat). In prison, Scott gives up hope but his faithful secretary, "Kansas," doggedly follows evanescent clues through shadowy nocturnal streets. Can she save Scott in time?
metadata.Actors: Franchot Tone, Ella Raines, Alan Curtis
